message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you first for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down to $130, but I can't go any lower than that.  It's a great deal for a product you'll love.
I'm still interested, but I can only go up to $110
